meta.name: Automate GoHighLevel Client Onboarding with Google Drive, Gmail, Calendar & Slack

name: GoHighLevel Client Onboarding with Google Drive, Gmail & Slack

parameters.content:
## üöÄ GoHighLevel Automated Client Onboarding

**What This Workflow Does:**
- Automatically triggers when a deal is marked as "Won" in GoHighLevel
- Creates organized client folders in Google Drive
- Duplicates contract and kickoff deck templates
- Sends welcome email to new clients
- Creates onboarding tasks in GHL
- Schedules kickoff call in Google Calendar
- Notifies team via Slack

**Business Value:**
‚úÖ Saves 30-45 minutes per client onboarding
‚úÖ Eliminates manual data entry errors
‚úÖ Ensures consistent client experience
‚úÖ Automatic document generation
‚úÖ Team stays informed instantly

**Prerequisites:**
- Active GoHighLevel account with API access
- Google Workspace (Drive, Gmail, Calendar)
- Slack workspace
- Contract template in Google Drive
- Kickoff deck template in Google Drive

**Setup Time:** ~15 minutes

## ‚öôÔ∏è Step 1: Configure GHL Webhook

**Action Required:**
1. Go to GoHighLevel ‚Üí Automation ‚Üí Workflows
2. Create new automation triggered by "Opportunity Status Changed"
3. Add condition: Status = "Won"
4. Add webhook action
5. Copy the production URL from this webhook node
6. Paste it in GHL webhook URL field
7. Test the webhook from GHL

**Webhook Path:** `/ghl-deal-won`

**Expected Data:**
- Opportunity ID, name, value
- Contact name, email, phone
- Company information
- Pipeline details

## üîê Step 2: Connect GHL API

**Action Required:**
1. Get your GHL API credentials:
   - Login to GoHighLevel
   - Settings ‚Üí API Access
   - Create new OAuth2 App or use API Key
2. In this node, click "Create New Credential"
3. Select "HighLevel OAuth2 API"
4. Enter your credentials
5. Authorize access

**Filter:** Only fetches opportunities with status = "Won"

**Note:** This node validates the webhook data before processing

## ‚úÖ Step 3: Data Validation

**What This Does:**
- Checks if required fields are present (ID, Name)
- If valid ‚Üí Continues to formatting
- If invalid ‚Üí Triggers error notification

**Prevents:**
- Processing incomplete data
- Workflow failures from missing info
- Bad data reaching Google Drive/Email

**No configuration needed** - works automatically

## üìä Step 4: Format Client Data

**What This Does:**
- Extracts client info from GHL opportunity
- Standardizes naming conventions
- Creates safe folder/file names
- Formats dates consistently
- Adds validation flags

**Output Fields:**
- Client name, email, phone
- Deal value, ID, status
- Folder naming: `ClientName_YYYY-MM-DD`
- Document templates with client name

**No configuration needed** - processes automatically

## üìÅ Step 5: Google Drive Setup

**Action Required:**
1. **Create Credential:**
   - Click "Create New Credential"
   - Select "Google Drive OAuth2"
   - Authorize your Google account

2. **Set Parent Folder:**
   - Replace the hardcoded folder ID with your folder
   - Use the folder dropdown to select

3. **Prepare Templates:**
   - Create contract template in Drive
   - Create kickoff deck template
   - Note their file IDs (from URL)
   - Update the Copy Template nodes with these IDs

**This Creates:** A new folder with client info document

## üìÑ Step 6: Template Configuration

**Action Required:**
1. **Contract Template:**
   - Open the "Copy Contract Template" node
   - Click the file dropdown
   - Select your contract template
   - Or paste File ID manually

2. **Kickoff Deck Template:**
   - Open the "Copy Kickoff Deck Template" node
   - Select your presentation template

**Templates Will:**
- Be copied to client folder
- Auto-rename with client name
- Preserve all formatting

**Tip:** Use Google Docs/Slides with placeholder text like `{{CLIENT_NAME}}`

## üí¨ Step 7: Slack Integration

**Action Required:**
1. **Connect Slack:**
   - Click "Create New Credential"
   - Select "Slack API"
   - Authorize workspace access

2. **Select Channel:**
   - Open the channel dropdown
   - Choose your team notifications channel
   - Recommended: #client-onboarding or #sales

3. **Customize Message:**
   - Edit the notification text as needed
   - Add/remove fields
   - Include relevant links

**Notification Includes:**
- Client details
- Deal value
- Link to Drive folder
- Confirmation of completed steps

## üìÖ Step 8: Calendar & Email Setup

**Google Calendar:**
1. Connect your Google Calendar credential
2. Select the calendar for kickoff calls
3. Customize event details/duration

**Gmail Welcome Email:**
1. Connect Gmail OAuth2 credential
2. **IMPORTANT:** Change the hardcoded email to use:
   `={{ $('Format Client Data').item.json.clientEmail }}`
3. Customize email template:
   - Replace `[Your Company]` with your company name
   - Update branding/colors
   - Modify welcome message
   - Update links

**Email Includes:**
- Welcome message
- Next steps checklist
- Calendar booking link
- Drive folder access

## ‚úÖ Step 9: GHL Task Creation

**Action Required:**
1. **Remove Hardcoded Contact ID:**
   - Replace `9MWQz6J9ZWfZyzWiHxkG` with:
   `={{ $('Format Client Data').item.json.contactId }}`

2. **Customize Task:**
   - Set appropriate due date
   - Change `completed: true` to `false` if task should be open
   - Add assignee if needed

3. **Task Details:**
   - Title uses client name automatically
   - Links back to opportunity
   - Appears in GHL dashboard

**Purpose:** Creates follow-up task for account manager

## üö® Error Handling

**What This Does:**
- Catches validation failures
- Sends Slack alert if workflow fails
- Includes error details for debugging

**Configure:**
1. Select your Slack alerts channel
2. Customize error message format
3. Add @mentions if needed

**When Triggered:**
- Missing required client data
- Invalid opportunity format
- Data validation fails

**Tip:** Set up a dedicated #n8n-errors channel

nodes.name: GHL Webhook - Deal Won
nodes.notes: Webhook trigger for GHL when deal moves to Won or Completed. Configure in GHL: Automation > Workflows > Add Webhook

nodes.notes: Sends branded welcome email with onboarding details

parameters.message:
=

Welcome Aboard, {{ $('Format Client Data').item.json.clientName }}! üéâ

We're thrilled to have you as a client! Your success is our top priority, and we're committed to delivering exceptional results.

Next Steps:

  1. Review Your Welcome Kit: Attached is your comprehensive onboarding guide
  2. Schedule Your Kickoff Call: Click here to book your onboarding session
  3. Access Your Documents: View your client folder

Your dedicated account manager will reach out within 24 hours to answer any questions.

Looking forward to an amazing partnership!

The [Your Company Name] Team
parameters.subject: =Welcome to [Your Company Name] - Let's Get Started! üöÄ
